title: Patience Pays Off for a Veteran Backer of Brazilian Startups
sub_head: For more than a decade, Accel partner Kevin Efrusy has bet on the tech scene and digital transformation of Latin America’s largest economy
body:
Latin America’s tech scene is booming: Venture-backed companies in the region drew $14.8 billion in investments in 2021, as of Dec. 16, more than they received the past six years combined, according to research firm PitchBook Data Inc.
Brazil in particular has been a standout, attracting three times the amount of venture investment last year than it did in each of the past two. Yet long before the current upsurge, a small group of foreign investors started betting on the region’s largest economy. Accel, based in Palo Alto,...
